SUBSCRIPTION

 

Annual subscription of the printed version of the Cadernos Cedes is as follows:

  • You wil receive the magazines:
    Natural person = R$47,00
    Legal entity = R$70,00
    Single issues = R$18,00.

Orders should be sent to the address below, accompanied by full name and postal address, telephone, fax, e-mail, institution and area of work, and subject of interest for research, and nominal check or payment order to CEDES - C/C BANESPA AG. 0207 ACCOUNT 13,030,001-7, or B. do BRASIL AG. 2447-3 ACCOUNT 14.403-7.

Informations about subscription to the print journal issues should be requested directly with:

Nilda Aparecida Silva. E-mail: distrib@cedes.unicamp.br/Phone: +55 19 3521-6710

 

The online journal is free and open access
